description: Following the hotel’s rebranding, this restaurant has also recently changed name and chef and now offers bistro-style dishes at lunchtime and more elaborate, refined cuisine in the evening. Choose from three tasting menus: Acqua (an equal balance of fish and seafood); Terra  (meat dishes) and Aria (vegetarian options).
